title: 604. Thoughts on Justin Fields' First Game + Steelers vs. Ravens Preview
itunes:title: 604. Thoughts on Justin Fields' First Game + Steelers vs. Ravens Preview
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys give their takeaways from the MNF game between the Rams and Bears, while having a further discussion on why NFL teams should have more creative coaches from college and also, they look at the benefit of offensive and defensive coaches working together (4:51). After that, the pair give their thoughts and scouting reports on Ohio State QB Justin Fields' first game against Nebraska (16:12). To wrap up the show, the duo preview the Steelers vs. Ravens Week 8 matchup and they also talk about their own experiences around physical teams (28:04).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
